page.title: 20LOCAL ISSUES.
page.content: These issues feature in local POLITICS as arguments between landowner farmers and the general public. ENCLOSURES:Some farmers have sold off small plots of land as enclosures for privately owned horses to graze.They are able to do this without asking for planning permission as Government LEGISLATION allows for land_use to be changed if the enclosure is less than 5 acres.This is annoying many people as planning permission is required to alter a house but not a field! STUBBLE BURNING:Villagers complain each year about this practice.They fear that one day homes will burn too. Calls are being made for farmers to stop this tradition. Drivers also complain about the smoke adversely affecting visibility on local roads.
